Current project

Within the Nephological semantics project, I use vector space models to look at the semasiological variation within a type (e.g. polysemy) and a visualization tool developed within the project to assess the effect of parameter tuning in our models.

Click here to take a look!

Current subproject

Within the Nephological semantics project, we will require many different words to be annotated with their senses as well as the context words that helped identified them. I designed an interface to make this annotation an easier and more pleasant experience.

You can play around with it here!
